I woudl appreciate all available info though tysm 1 May 21, 2025 EasyVictor ARC2 Senior Archer 5/21/25, 12:20 AM Flame Demon ‚Ä¢ This boss will have 3 different attacks: 3x charges. , Jump charge followed immediately by random falling meteors. , Flame Shoot attack that will split into 6 smaller flames that spread outward. , (Typically this is the order of attacks, however, he can skip or repeat) ‚Ä¢ My method (like with most bosses) is to think of the triangle shape but the orientation does not matter. -also after each movement, get one or two shots off, but never three, it‚Äôs too risky. ‚Ä¢ Using the triangle method is the best way to avoid his 3x charge. This will also keep him in close if you are using circle attack/runes. After movement, shoot shoot move. ‚Ä¢ Second attack is typically jump attack then immediate meteors. If you can get one shot off in between these attacks go for it, but not at the cost of eating a meteor. After the meteors fall, shoot shoot move. ‚Ä¢ Lastly, you have the flame shot that splits into 6. The triangle method is perfect to avoid this because it may be a charge. Avoid the flame, possibly shoot, move to avoid the flame spread, shoot again. Rinse and repeat ARC2 Flame Demon ‚Ä¢ This boss will have 3 different attacks: 3x charges. , Jump charge followed immediately by random falling meteors. , Flame Shoot attack that will split into 6 smaller flames that spread outward. (Typically this is the order of attacks, however, he can skip or repeat) ‚Ä¢ My method (like with most bosses) is to think of the triangle shape EpicJapan | for Help :D ARC2 Chat Mod 5/21/25, 1:23 AM ty' May 22, 2025 EasyVictor ARC2 Senior Archer 5/22/25, 7:02 PM Stone Golem ‚Ä¢ This boss has 3 different attacks. A rolling bowling boulder attack that eventually splits into 6. The big boulder will also track/follow. , (If this big boulder hits a wall, it will not split and will disappear) A triple rock split. , (Edit) Lastly, he also shoots 5 fast boulders at that are mostly guaranteed hits if you are close to him. , (If you freeze or paralyze him, he will never throw these) ‚Ä¢ This boss will always throw with his right arm. ‚Ä¢ My trick is to stand mostly in between him in the center and the wall. This is in the hopes when he tosses the boulder, it will cancel. If it‚Äôs the triple rock split you‚Äôre still good to go. , ‚Ä¢ The biggest point is to always rotate to dodge in a counterclockwise direction. This is to have to better chance of dodging the tosses. If you dodge clockwise, you run a much bigger risk of taking a bolder or rock throw. , (edited) 1 1 ARC2 Stone Golem ‚Ä¢ This boss has 3 different attacks. This is because it prevents someone from sniping you and dropping you in the rankings after you have improved your rankings. And since the arena becomes unplayable 10 minutes before the daily reset, it is recommended to start playing 20-30 minutes before the reset. You could save your tickets and use them all at once on the last day, but I don't know if I would recommend that since you would be wasting 5 tickets each day. Does tickets stack? , , Yes. If you have 0-5 tickets when daily reset, it will reset to 5 tickets. If you have 6 or more, the number won't change. Every day, you can gain 3 more by doing daily tasks, 5 more by buying with gems, 50 more by buying with guild coins. Regarding other modes, ‚Å†unknown Is there a way to skip the battle? , , The first option is to buy a monthly card. The second option is to press the pause button in the upper left corner right after the battle starts and leave the battle (the result will be reflected). Which build should I use? , , In arena, Dragoon set is recommended. However, many people concentrate on Oracle, so I have created a thread to discuss the rune build for Oracle users. ‚Å†[Check pinned msg] Arena Build‚Ä¶ (edited) 6 Follow EpicJapan | for Help :D ARC2 Chat Mod 4/13/25, 9:30 PM What is the best strategy when I'm stuck in my current group? , , Deliberately demote one level and achieve a higher ranking in that group. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. The second option is to press the pause button in the upper left corner right after the battle starts and leave the battle (the result will be reflected). Which build should I use? , , In arena, Dragoon set is recommended. However, many people concentrate on Oracle, so I have created a thread to discuss the rune build for Oracle users. ‚Å†[Check pinned msg] Arena Build‚Ä¶ (edited) If you have other arena questions, feel free to ask here , What time should I play Arena every day? , , I recommend 20-30 minutes before the daily reset. This is because it prevents someone from sniping you and dropping you in the rankings after you have improved your rankings. And since the arena becomes unplayable 10 minutes before the daily reset, it is recommended to start playing 20-30 minutes before the reset. You could save your tickets and use them all at once on the last day, but I don't know if I would recommend that since you would be wasting 5 tickets each day. Does tickets stack? , , Yes. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. If you have 0-5 tickets when daily reset, it will reset to 5 tickets. If you have 6 or more, the number won't change. Every day, you can gain 3 more by doing daily tasks, 5 more by buying with gems, 50 more by buying with guild coins. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. If you have 0-5 tickets when daily reset, it will reset to 5 tickets. If you have 6 or more, the number won't change. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3. EpicJapan | for Help :D ARC2 Chat Mod 4/13/25, 9:30 PM Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 9:30 PM What is the best strategy when I'm stuck in my current group? , , Deliberately demote one level and achieve a higher ranking in that group. Specifically, check the ranking rewards, see if you would earn more if you dropped one group below you, and decide whether to stay in your current group or be demoted. How exactly do I demote myself? , , Keep your equipment off in preset and lower your power. Then play and lose. The way to check the rank to be demoted depends on the group. For those in the Supreme group, it is easy to see that you will be demoted if your ranking is lower than the displayed ranking. For those in the Diamond Master group, multiply the number of people being promoted by 3 and get below that rank. As shown in the picture above, the top 20% are promoted and the bottom 40% are demoted. Since the bottom 40% are below the top 60%, the number of those promoted (20%) should be multiplied by 3.
